TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpCachePolicyWrapper extends System.Web.HttpCachePolicyBase

summary.span: Encapsulates the HTTP intrinsic object that contains methods for setting cache-specific HTTP headers and for controlling the ASP.NET page output cache.

span.span: Encapsulates the HTTP intrinsic object that contains methods for setting cache-specific HTTP headers and for controlling the ASP.NET page output cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自類別，並做為包裝函式類別。The class derives from the class and serves as a wrapper for the class. 這個類別會公開的功能類別也公開時型別。This class exposes the functionality of the class while also exposing the type. 類別可讓您取代的原始實作並用自訂的實作，例如，當您執行單元測試的 ASP.NET 管線外的應用程式中的類別。The class enables you to replace the original implementation of the class in your application with a custom implementation, such as when you perform unit testing outside the ASP.NET pipeline.
